metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8073 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android 4.4 and 5.1 before 5.1.1 LMY48X allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 14388161, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2015-6608 and CVE-2015-8072.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
